Question: On the second landing, they became stuck and according to this person, Yeager was in fits of laughter.
Hints: As vice-chairman, this person was in charge of the operational side of the commission.
In the late 1950s, this person applied at a local Methodist church to lead a Boy Scout troop.
This person flew 78 missions over Korea for a total of 121 hours in the air, most of which were in January 1952.
